bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.summary: Entries in Overview missing for run that's in state "running"
bug.description:
A few fields are missing when run is in state running or crashed, ie Python version, command, system hardware <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/nccl_multiversion/runs/ijgl6afm/overview>https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/nccl_multiversion/runs/ijgl6afm/overview</denchmark-link>
That information, especially "Command" is useful for debugging hanging/crashing runs
